titles.title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of a certain entry of warp knitting machines as free of certain duties.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E606)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/11/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to liquidate or reliquidate without imposing any duties, and refund any duties paid, on a certain entry of warp knitting machines.
